problem.markdown:
>>Sustainability Director Rosi Kerr described Dartmouth’s organizational strategy to lower greenhouse gas emissions. This is called a ____________ .<<
( ) sustainability initiative ( ) conservation roadmap ( ) renewable energy plan (x) climate action plan ( ) portfolio diversification plan
[explanation] A climate action plan is an organizational strategy to lower greenhouse gas emissions. This can include lower energy use, switching fuels, conservation and increasing efficiency of buildings and machines. [explanation]
problem.p: Sustainability Director Rosi Kerr described Dartmouth’s organizational strategy to lower greenhouse gas emissions. This is called a ____________ .

choicegroup.label: Sustainability Director Rosi Kerr described Dartmouth’s organizational strategy to lower greenhouse gas emissions. This is called a ____________ .

div.p: A climate action plan is an organizational strategy to lower greenhouse gas emissions. This can include lower energy use, switching fuels, conservation and increasing efficiency of buildings and machines.
